content.question: Which of the following groups of cities contains the best examples of central places with large hinterlands?

choices.label: San Diego, Milwaukee, and New Haven

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 6.4: The Size and Distribution of Cities

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain the significance of geographic similarities and differences among different locations and/or at different times.
